name: Nichibutsu Arcade Classics
description:
Nichibutsu Arcade Classics contains four classic Nichibutsu games in emulated form:
  • Moon Cresta
  • Crazy Climber
  • Frisky Tom
  • SF-X
  • Crazy Climber '85, a version of Crazy Climber with enhanced graphics, original to this release
  • Tom's Strikes Back, a version of Frisky Tom with modified gameplay, where instead of picking up the pipe pieces that are dropped by the mice, you rotate pipe joints, also original to this release.
Game settings can be configured per game before you begin to play. You can also see their instruction card in the options screen. Additionally, a gallery of posters for their earlier games, including their release dates, is accessible from the title screen.
